attributes.action: Give Human Rights to the Elderly in Private Care Homes to Protect Against Abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having just watched Panorama 12/03/07 I was appalled to hear that the elderly in Private Care Homes DO NOT have the same Human Rights as any other Elderly person, nor are they protected against abuse as children are.  This needs to be changed with immediate effect please give the Elderly the same rights of protection as are given to others.  They need to be covered by the Human Rights Act.
